title: Reeking of Impropriety
description: The Supreme Court handed down 11 opinions last week-- 18 more to go. Leah and Melissa recap the outcomes, and then turn to our weekly "Ginni Tonic" segment, because there's always something new there.
author: hey@crooked.com (leah litman, melissa murray)
